posts.post_title: T206 Ty Cobb PSA 4 Green Portrait for sale
posts.post_content:
Hello,

Looking to sell my PSA 4 T206 Ty Cobb Green Portrait before the holidays. Need money for repairs back home in NY after Hurricane Sandy. Looking for $2250 incl. shipping or best offer. Paypal please or postal money order.

Email [url]kilaartist@aol.com[/url] to make offer. Serious interest only.

[url]http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=4&u=17829358[/url]
[url]http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=3&u=17829358[/url]

Doug

Doug- good luck with the sale under very unfortunate circumstances......

Misunderstanding...
I said that that it was alot of card for the money..
